title: Deleting single bookmarks
content:
Hello,

Occasionally I select a bookmark in my menu bar that has become orphaned. Once on the page, I select the "Blue Star" and then try to remove the bookmark for that page to no avail. The bookmark remains even after shutting down and restarting Firefox (sync is off). Moreover, there are some bookmarks for which the "Remove Bookmark" option is not available after selecting the Blue Star.

I know that I can delete unwanted bookmarks using the Bookmark Manager but that method is time consuming when it comes to unknown, orphaned bookmarks that one stumbles upon from time to time. The aforementioned technique for removing these orphaned bookmarks is quicker assuming it worked.

Perhaps the Blue Star could remain filled in once a page is saved and subsequently returned too. Should one wish to remove the bookmark one need only return to the page and deselect the filled in Blue Star thus returning it to its outlined form while also removing the bookmark from ones menu.

Thoughts?
creator: michael.edwards

title: Applications showing in Settings, General in Firefox
content: I completely removed a program from my computer several days ago. The program name still shows in Firefox, settings, general, applications. The program is showing in the applications section in content type and then action shows to the right of the content type. How do I completely remove the program name that is still showing in Firefox, Settings, General, Applications? If I need to go to the registry could you please tell me how to locate it in the registry? Thank you

title: Video full screen = firefox fullscreen
content:
Da qualche mese, Firefox decide di andare automaticamente in fullscreen se viene minimizzato quando è attivo un video in fullscreen

Azioni da fare 1) andare su youtube o altro sito simile 2) far partire un video a schermo intero 3) minimizzare firefox 4) ripristinare firefox

Risultato Il video non sarà più in fullscreen ma lo sarà Firefox (mancano barra delle schede, degli indirizzi e pure la barra delle applicazioni di windows è nascosta da Firefox)

PS: so che per molti la cosa non è fattibile, ma avendo io 2 monitor posso minimizzare windows usando l'icona sulla barra delle applicazioni del monitor in cui non c'è il video di Firefox in fullscreen
creator: theinvoker

title: Private windows feature not working
content:
I have firefox configured to always run using private mode by default. However sometimes i need a new private window with empty localstorage, sessionstorage and cookiejar etc. For example if i want to sign into a website with two separate accounts such as an email client. However, recently, when i click "New private window" and within it navigate to a website I see my preexisting session from my original firefox instance. In the case of the email client this means I can only log in using a single account with the firefox browser. Currently I have to open another browser such as chrome or edge to solve this issue.

Is this expected behaviour or is there something wrong with my local setup?

Thanks
creator: mr.englishman

Does anyone have any idea what the reason of this problem is and how I can fix it?

title: lišta záložek
content:
Dobrý den,

dnes během práce na počítači mi zmizely uložené záložky na Liště. Lišta je zobrazená stále, zbyl mi tam jediné odkaz na Google překladač. Hledal jsem záložky také ve Správě záložek, ale nikde nejsou. Prohlížeč jsem zavřel a otevřel znovu, ale nic se nestalo. Dva dny předtím se stalo, že se mi ty samé záložky zkopírovaly na Liště a měl jsem je tam všechny dvakrát.

Je nějaká šance moje záložky na Liště obnovit?

Prohlížeč používám na pracovním počítači.

Děkuji, Pazlar
